description: Introducing Socket.IO 1.026 May 201428 May 2014 – Guillermo Rauch (@rauchg)The first version of Socket.IO was created shortly after Node.JS made its first appearance. I had been looking for a framework that easily enabled me to push data from a server to a client for a long time, and even had tried…
